about_us.title: About Us
about_us.our_story_text: Founded in 2023 by a group of passionate travelers, Tripsify started with a simple idea: to make discovering and booking tours as seamless as the journey itself. We were tired of complicated booking processes and wanted to create a platform where every traveler could find their perfect adventure with ease.

1.title: Curated Experiences
1.text: Every tour is hand-picked by our team to ensure quality and authenticity.

2.title: Best-Price Guarantee
2.text: We work directly with providers to offer you unbeatable prices on your adventures.

3.title: Safety and Trust
3.text: Your security is our priority. We partner only with verified and trusted tour operators.
